title: Succubus na Iinchou ni Okotowari Saremashite
original_name: サキュバスな委員長にお断りされまして
sinopse:
Riku Kugahara witnessed a succubus predating on his way out of school as usual, and was fascinated by her intense appearance! However, the succubus was actually Mei Kirihara, the class chairman!

(Source: Takeshobo, translated)
